user.affiliations: SIL International; University of Hawai`I at Manoa

collection.name: South Sulawesi
collection.creator-role: annotator, author, compiler, editor, researcher, transcriber
collection.rights-management: Open Publishing, Common Content, GNU Publishing
collection.description: Twelve speech varieties of South Sulawesi, Indonesia, from survey trips in 1982 and 1983, imported from WordSurv file constructed by Joseph E. Grimes.
collection.remarks: 12 varieties, 202 entries. Short names of varieties and secondary glosses added from monograph.
collection.coverage: Southern Peninsula of Sulawesi and Selayar Island
collection.published-source: Grimes, Charles E. and Grimes, Barbara D. 1987. Languages of South Sulawesi (Materials in Languages of Indonesia, No. 38, W. A. L. Stokhof, Series Editor). Pacific Linguistics Series D - No. 78. Pp. i-viii, 1-208.
collection.stable-copy-location: Linguistics Department, Research Center for Pacific Studies, The Australian National University, Canberra, ACT 2601, Australia

variety.name: Makassar of Gowa
variety.source: Grimes, Charles E. and Grimes, Barbara D. 1987. Languages of South Sulawesi (Materials in Languages of Indonesia, No. 38, W. A. L. Stokhof, Series Editor). Pacific Linguistics Series D - No. 78. Pp. i-viii, 1-208.
variety.unpublished-source: Tjako (70 years); Umi Daeng Bau' (41 years)
variety.remarks: B implosive > ɓ, R trill > r N vB implosive > ɓ, R trill > r N velar > ŋ; J alveopalatal > ʤ, c palatal J>j, D fricative > ð, O open > ɔ, Place where collected: Malino, Gowa, Collected by: Charles Grimes, Date collected: 1984

variety.name: Konjo of Pesisir (Coastal)
variety.source: Grimes, Charles E. and Grimes, Barbara D. 1987. Languages of South Sulawesi (Materials in Languages of Indonesia, No. 38, W. A. L. Stokhof, Series Editor). Pacific Linguistics Series D - No. 78. Pp. i-viii, 1-208.
variety.remarks: Collected by Charles E. Grimes at Tanalemo, Bulukumba, 1984., Collected by: Charles Grimes, Date collected: 1984

variety.name: Selayar
variety.source: Grimes, Charles E. and Grimes, Barbara D. 1987. Languages of South Sulawesi (Materials in Languages of Indonesia, No. 38, W. A. L. Stokhof, Series Editor). Pacific Linguistics Series D - No. 78. Pp. i-viii, 1-208.
variety.remarks: Collected by: Charles Grimes, Date collected: 1984
